xxl.core.indexStructures

Class HilbertRTree.Node.Distribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • xxl.core.indexStructures.HilbertRTree.Node.Distribution
  • Enclosing class:
    HilbertRTree.Node

    protected class HilbertRTree.Node.Distribution
extends Object
    Distribution is the class used to represent the distribution of entries of a node of the HilbertRTree into two partitions used for a split.
    See Also:
    RTree.Node.Distribution

      • Distribution

                       int secondStart,
                       Rectangle firstDescriptor,
                       Rectangle secondDescriptor)
        Parameters:
        entries - an array containing all entries to be distributed
        secondStart - the start index of the second partition
        firstDescriptor - the descriptor for the first partition
        secondDescriptor - the descriptor for the second partition
        dim - the number of dimensions

    • Method Detail

      • entries

        protected List entries(boolean second)
        Returns one of the partitions of this distribution.
        Parameters:
        second - a boolean value determining if the second partition should be returned
        Returns:
        the entries of the first (if second == false) or of the second partition (if second == true)

      • descriptor

        protected Descriptor descriptor(boolean second)
        Returns a descriptor of one of the partitions of this distribution.
        Parameters:
        second - a boolean value determining if the descriptor of second partition should be returned
        Returns:
        the descriptor of the first (if second == false) or of the second partition (if second == true)
